column2: 1. Which of the following time periods best describes when your house was built?
column3: 2. What do you know about the architecture of the house?
column4: 3. Select the best option which describes your house
column5: 4. How many stories does your house have?
column6: 5. State the area of your house in square feet?
column7: 7. Relationship to the head of the household
column9: 9. Current attendance at school or other educational institution
column11: 11-a How much is your household's average monthly expenditure in LKR for "food" items ?
column12: 11-b How much is your household's average monthly expenditure in LKR for "non-food" items ?
column13: 12. What is the best representation of the major material your outside walls are made of?
column14: 13. Which of the following options do your house use for ventilation and lighting other than windows and doors (only indoors)?
column15: 14. What is the major type of roof installation used in your house (on the highest floor)?
column16: 15. Nearly how many red notices did you receive last year?
column17: 16. Which of the below is true regarding your normal bill payment practice (example given when the bill is Rs 4566)?
column18: 17. Was your wiring done by a professional electrician?
column19: 18. Which of the following do you use in your household for generating electricity?
column20: 19. If using solar energy, which of the following purposes do you use solar energy inside your house?
column21: 20. Which of the following can most accurately describe your know-how in electricity bill calculation?
column22: 21. Which of the following best describes your behavior of ironing clothes?
column23: 22. Which of the following best describes your behavior regarding night lighting considering the whole house?
column24: 23. Do you check your electricity meter for over-consumption?
column25: 24. Do you look at the energy rating of an appliance when buying one?
column27: 26. Which Secretarial division your house belonged?
